features: The PNY DUO LINK USB 3.2 Type-C Dual Flash Drive is the ideal mobile storage solution for file management on-the-go
Free up space on Type-C equipped Android mobile devices by transferring photos, videos, music and more to DUO LINK, making room for more memories
Transfer digital content from mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets to full size devices such as laptop and desktop computers for more permanent storage
Access and stream digital content anytime, anywhere, directly from DUO LINK, no Wi-Fi connection needed
Exceptional performance with read speeds of up to 200MB/s and transfers up to 20x faster than USB 2.0, coupled with a sleek, metal design
Dual connectors; a USB 3.2 Type-C connector for Type-C Android mobile devices and newer gen PC & Mac laptop and desktop computers, and a USB 3.2 Type-A connector for previous gen computers
body.description: The PNY DUO LINK USB 3.2 Type-C Dual Flash Drive bridges the gap between mobile and desktop, making it the ideal mobile storage solution for file management on-the-go. DUO LINK is the perfect tool to free up space on Type-C equipped mobile devices by allowing users to move content such as photos, videos, music, and more from their smartphones and tablets to the drive, making room for more, and ensuring they will never miss an opportunity to capture content due to lack of memory. What’s more, the DUO LINK Dual Flash Drive allows for the transfer of content to full size devices such as laptop and desktop computers for permanent storage. With read speeds of up to 200MB/s and transfers up to 30x faster than USB 2.0, moving content from the drive to a computer is quick and easy. From there, users can take their content to the next level and create videos, social posts, process prints, or simply save their files on a more permanent storage device. The DUO Link USB 3.2 Type-C Dual Flash Drive is ideal for use across operating systems and host devices. With a USB 3.2 Type-C connector for Type-C Android mobile devices and newer gen PC & Mac laptop and desktop computers, and a USB 3.2 Type-A connector for previous gen computers, the potential for content creation and file management is near limitless.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.1 4.1 out of 5 stars 159 ratings 4.1 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reads fast writes slow. Don't panic.
reviews.reviewText: It is small and handy between phone or tablet android based. It does not claim to write faster than usb 2.0. It reads much faster. I see some folks got defective physical C usb connector. The 3 I have are not defective. I made Acronis rescue media and restored 40gb to my bitlocked laptop. I am happy with how fast it restored. I did have one device that windows 11 had trouble formatting to ntfs. That sort of scared me but it did format fine in another laptop. If the build issue still exists I don't see it any I have. Everything about it is in written form on the back. Maybe there are faster write speeds but not with the phone usb C support. This a unique product. Based on current 3.2 USB but that only means you can plug it to something 3.2 there aren't claims to support optimal 3.2 transfer speeds. I could not find another small device like this to go between machines with differing physical connections. I'm only worried about the one that was tricky to format.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice design with USB C and A connectors
reviews.reviewText: I really like how this flash drive has USB C on one end and USB A on the other end. I was able to transfer files for a recent trip from my desktop, which only has USB A connectors and later access the files on my Surface 9, which only has USB C connectors. It was very fast to transfer the data, which was a surprise as most USB drives start out fast then slow down when you transfer large files. This one seemed to keep the transfer speed in high gear the whole time. I did not run any metrics on it but it seemed to be faster than other drives I have used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This product is hardly usable
reviews.reviewText: Checked the reviews to see if maybe I've got a flawed sample, but no, seems to be a common case. Using this drive is an absolute hell, you can't simply stick the USB-C side in, since it retracts back due to an amazingly bad design and basically loose internals. You need to use unconventional angles and manually push on the other connection interface in order to use the one you need.I have no idea how this product came through all the checks of the brand like PNY, but I know that due to that 25$ flash drive I'll probably avoid PNY products in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product does exactly what it supposed to do. Very pleased. I’m not having issues around plugging up to my Mac or iPhone 15 pro max.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Only one small problem
reviews.reviewText: Drive works great. Size is perfect, The issue is while in my pocket. If the USB C port is to the outside, sometimes the guts get pushed out of the back side of the USB A port. And I have to fiddle with it to get it to spin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works great, just hard to plug in
reviews.reviewText: This works great but the part that plugs in actually moves back and forth. It will not plug in all the way and you have to use a pen or something to push it in so it will work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great size. I needed both types of usb and this one has them both on a swivel. Perfect for my keychain.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don't buy this. It has a connector design issue on the USB C side.
reviews.reviewText: PNY is usually a quality brand so I was surprised when I discovered that the USB C connector was designed too short so that it won't connect and actually just falls out of the USB C slot. I initiated a return soon after receiving this flash memory key. Very disappointed with this design issue.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bardzo dobre wykonanie, OTG działa z S21FE w etui
reviews.reviewText: Niektóre flashe USB-C mają za krótką wtyczkę do telefonu w etui, ten daje radę. Generalnie lepiej wykonany, niż się spodziewałem, obejma z jednego kawałka metalu, nie plastik plus blaszka. Dobry zakup.
Jolie produit rapidement de qui est solide

La clé a été remplie à partir d'un PC sous Windows puis a été utilisée sous Windows et Android.Le fonctionnement semble fiable (quoique peu d'essais ; voir suite). La vitesse en lecture et en écriture est ++abominablement lente++, empêchant toute autre utilisation que pour l'archivage !!Exemple : durée de la reconnaissance de la clé sur une tablette Xiaomi Redmi Pad 6, entr l'intertion de la clé et l'affichage du contenu du dossier principal : 40 secondes ! Comparaison : clé Kingston, mêmes types de connexions, même capacité, même contenu : 11 secondes.La clé a été reformatée en exFat sous Windows comme lors de sa livraison et a été regarnie, sans changer les durées
